welcome: Hello and welcome, I am Botin from Bot-In, how can I help you today?
companydata: Bot-In, We are a platform that create personlised chatbots in minutes just by filling a form and voila your chatbot plugin is ready to use, with a variety of fonctionality our chatbot offers a lead magnet, a contact interface a rdv and appointement setter and a support ticket oppener and it gives access to general infos related to your company or subject of creating the chatbot
